plot: A young man named Kaimyouji Eizan is kidnapped by an evil genius Dr. Mad that modifies Eizans body into a cyborg that gives Eizan super powers. Eizan escapes and teams up with to skilled material arts sisters named Tsurugino Mai and Tsurugino Hikari to fight monsters like Dr. Mad and save the human world.
opening_theme: "Kokoro ni Anata ga Irukara (心にあなたがいるから)" by Mika Kanai
ending_theme: "Sayonara ja Nai (サヨナラじゃない; Not a Farewell)" by Kotono Mitsuishi
